trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around September 5th 1996
Summary: HOVERING OVER TREE LINE ON BUSINESS/RESIDENTIAL STREET
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home one earl fall late afternoon\early evening. i had just dropped my niece at her home which was about 10 miles north of where i lived at the time. as i was driving and playing around with my radio looking for a good station i noticed my car had stalled. this kinds confused me as just a second before i was listening to music, then nothing. i instantly tried to start my car and nothing happened. i then looked around and noticed there were no lights anywhere even though it had recently gotten dark. there were no other vehicles or people anywhere either. that was strange because it was a weekday on a fairly busy major route through my town. it was also evening rush hour. i then tried to look around to see what i might do to help myself. i became aware of a kinda low hum? coming from my right passenger side of the car. the windows were electric so i couldn't raise it down to ascertain where the sound was being produced. finally, i opened the driver car door next to me and kinda stood up against the car with the door leaning against me. as i looked up and across the road i saw what appeared to be a huge silent plane of some sort. it did not make any sound except for the low, low hum? i had originally heard?\felt. it was huge and i tried to come up for a way to gauge it's size in relevance to surrounding architecture. the only thing i could think of was it was at least 3 times longer than the football field at the high school right up the road from where i was standing. it looked like it was sitting right on top of the tree line\power lines that lined that side of the road. it was so big sideways and in height i knew i couldn't take the size all in my line of vision. it appeared to have starting around the middle of it a row of very tall windows illuminating a strong bright blue light. i was aware of several figures moving about and maybe even watching me watch them. i was not afraid or uncomfortable in any way. i don't know why in the world i would have stood outside my car to investigate this thing. in reality i would have never done something like that on my own. i am an avowed coward to say the lease and this was very out of character for me. as i watched it finally moved straight up higher above the trees silently. it then jetted n west towards newark rd\newark ohio. it accelerated so fast! just up and gone. it didn't turn itself around or maneuver at all, just slightly up and sideways gone like that! the next thing i know i am driving my car coming up to a gas station right up the road from where the craft had been. all the lights were on and traffic was very light. i had no idea of what time it was or how much had passed since my clock in the car had been disrupted. when i finally got home i saw my trip had taken me well over 3 hours to complete! i didn't know how to explain the missing time even to the sitter who was there for my young children. she was a friend of the family who actually lived with us at the time so that worked out just fine. i almost forgot the incident completely by then. i tried to remember every detail but just kept drifting way in thought or something. when my husband came home from work at 11 or so that night we didn't discuss it at all. i failed to say anything to him about it for about the next three months or so. i don't know why. i just kinda forgot.
